code: export var formatPrice=new Intl.NumberFormat('vi-VN',{style:'currency',currency:'VND'});export var pageNumber=function pageNumber(data,newsPerPage){var number=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(data.length/newsPerPage);i++){number.push(i);}return number;};export var findIndex=function findIndex(data,id){var temp=-1;data.forEach(function(data,index){if(data.id===id){temp=index;}});return temp;};export var search=function search(data,query){return data.filter(function(item){return item.Status.toLowerCase().includes(query);});};
